name: Convertem
overview:
Convertem helps brands and agencies leverage marketing and digital technologies to execute measurable multichannel campaigns that are integrated across existing and emerging marketing channels and programs.

Speed to Market That’s right. We are fast. You have a schedule and we have the thought-leadership, digital expertise, resources and development and project management methods to help you hit your deadlines.

Enterprise Quality To us, quality means helping you execute personalized branding experiences that scale with your growth. Our rigorous enterprise quality and testing processes ensure your brand is never embarrassed by ill-conceived strategies or failed implementation.

Future Proofing The ways customers interact with your brand changes daily. Your brand must stay ahead of the curve. Convertem future-proofs all projects by assuring your campaign is up to speed with all emerging media, mobile platforms, social media and evolving development protocol like HTML 5.

ROI Centricity Your bosses are asking you how your marketing investments are performing. Convertem projects offer enterprise grade web analytics across all channels (social, web, mobile) from leaders Google, Adobe (Omniture,) Webtrends, Coremetrics, Virtue, SAS, Radian6, or Flurry.
